english.segment1: Father of my salvation. And giver of my life. Lord of Heaven. All Creation. Sings of love divine
english.segment2: So we come in songs. With voices to sing. We're dressed in your love. And fit for a King
english.segment3: And love so amazing. And love so divine. We raise up our hearts to the giver of life. Grace undeserving. And grace that is mine. We give up life for love for Your love is life
english.segment4: You the teacher. And You the lover. And You the sacrifice. We Your people. And we Your children. And we Your patient bride
english.segment5: So we come in songs. With voices to sing. We're dressed in your love. And fit for a King
english.segment6: And love so amazing. And love so divine. We raise up our hearts to the giver of life. Grace undeserving. And grace that is mine. We give up life for love for Your love is life
english.segment7: 'Cause you are holy. You are holy
english.segment8: And we come in songs. With voices to sing. We're dressed in Your love. And fit for You our King
english.segment9: And love so amazing. And love so divine. We raise up our hearts to the giver of life. Grace undeserving. And grace that is mine. We give up life for love. We give up life for love. We give up life for love for Your love is life. For Your love is life.
